verses.verse: Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H6691>Zophar<s%> the <S%H5284>Naamathite<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>,
Therefore do my <S%H5587>thoughts<s%> cause me to <S%H7725>answer<s%>, and for this I make <S%H2363>haste<s%>. I make: Heb. my haste is in me
I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H4148>check<s%> of my <S%H3639>reproach<s%>, and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of my <S%H998>understanding<s%> causeth me to <S%H6030>answer<s%>.
<S%H3045>Knowest<s%> thou not this of <S%H5703>old<s%>, since <S%H120>man<s%> was <S%H7760>placed<s%> upon <S%H776>earth<s%>,
That the <S%H7445>triumphing<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H7138>short<s%>, and the <S%H8057>joy<s%> of the <S%H2611>hypocrite<s%> but for a <S%H7281>moment<s%>? short: Heb. from near
Though his <S%H7863>excellency<s%> mount <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and his <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H5060>reach<s%> unto the <S%H5645>clouds<s%>; clouds: Heb. cloud
Yet he shall <S%H6>perish<s%> for <S%H5331>ever<s%> like his own <S%H1561>dung<s%>: they which have <S%H7200>seen<s%> him shall <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H335>Where<s%> is he?
He shall fly <S%H5774>away<s%> as a <S%H2472>dream<s%>, and shall not be <S%H4672>found<s%>: yea, he shall be chased <S%H5074>away<s%> as a <S%H2384>vision<s%> of the <S%H3915>night<s%>.
The <S%H5869>eye<s%> also which <S%H7805>saw<s%> him shall see him no <S%H3254>more<s%>; neither shall his <S%H4725>place<s%> any more <S%H7789>behold<s%> him.

His <S%H1121>children<s%> shall seek to <S%H7521>please<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%>, and his <S%H3027>hands<s%> shall <S%H7725>restore<s%> their <S%H202>goods<s%>. His children: or, The poor shall oppress his children
His <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H4390>full<s%> of the sin of his <S%H5934>youth<s%>, which shall lie <S%H7901>down<s%> with him in the <S%H6083>dust<s%>.
Though <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> be <S%H4985>sweet<s%> in his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, though he <S%H3582>hide<s%> it under his <S%H3956>tongue<s%>;
Though he <S%H2550>spare<s%> it, and <S%H5800>forsake<s%> it not; but keep it <S%H4513>still<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> his <S%H2441>mouth<s%>: within: Heb. in the midst of his palate
Yet his <S%H3899>meat<s%> in his <S%H4578>bowels<s%> is <S%H2015>turned<s%>, it is the <S%H4846>gall<s%> of <S%H6620>asps<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> him.
He hath swallowed <S%H1104>down<s%> <S%H2428>riches<s%>, and he shall vomit them up <S%H6958>again<s%>: <S%H410>God<s%> shall cast them <S%H3423>out<s%> of his <S%H990>belly<s%>.
He shall <S%H3243>suck<s%> the <S%H7219>poison<s%> of <S%H6620>asps<s%>: the <S%H660>viper's<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> shall <S%H2026>slay<s%> him.
He shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H6390>rivers<s%>, the <S%H5104>floods<s%>, the <S%H5158>brooks<s%> of <S%H1706>honey<s%> and <S%H2529>butter<s%>. the floods: or, streaming brooks

That which he <S%H3022>laboured<s%> for shall he <S%H7725>restore<s%>, and shall not swallow it <S%H1104>down<s%>: according to his <S%H2428>substance<s%> shall the <S%H8545>restitution<s%> be, and he shall not <S%H5965>rejoice<s%> therein. his: Heb. the substance of his exchange

Because he hath <S%H7533>oppressed<s%> and hath <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%>; because he hath violently taken <S%H1497>away<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%> which he <S%H1129>builded<s%> not; oppressed: Heb. crushed
Surely he shall not <S%H3045>feel<s%> <S%H7961>quietness<s%> in his <S%H990>belly<s%>, he shall not <S%H4422>save<s%> of that which he <S%H2530>desired<s%>. feel: Heb. know
There shall none of his <S%H400>meat<s%> be <S%H8300>left<s%>; therefore shall no man <S%H2342>look<s%> for his <S%H2898>goods<s%>. none: or, be none left for his meat

In the <S%H4390>fulness<s%> <S%H4390><s%> of his <S%H5607>sufficiency<s%> he shall be in <S%H3334>straits<s%>: every <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6001>wicked<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> upon him. wicked: or, troublesome

When he is about to <S%H4390>fill<s%> his <S%H990>belly<s%>, God shall <S%H7971>cast<s%> the <S%H2740>fury<s%> of his <S%H639>wrath<s%> upon him, and shall <S%H4305>rain<s%> it upon him while he is <S%H3894>eating<s%>.
He shall <S%H1272>flee<s%> from the <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H5402>weapon<s%>, and the <S%H7198>bow<s%> of <S%H5154>steel<s%> shall strike him <S%H2498>through<s%>.

It is <S%H8025>drawn<s%>, and cometh <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H1465>body<s%>; yea, the glittering <S%H1300>sword<s%> cometh <S%H1980>out<s%> of his <S%H4846>gall<s%>: <S%H367>terrors<s%> are upon him.

All <S%H2822>darkness<s%> shall be <S%H2934>hid<s%> in his secret <S%H6845>places<s%>: a <S%H784>fire<s%> not <S%H5301>blown<s%> shall <S%H398>consume<s%> him; it shall go <S%H3415>ill<s%> with him that is <S%H8300>left<s%> in his <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>.
The <S%H8064>heaven<s%> shall <S%H1540>reveal<s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>; and the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall rise <S%H6965>up<s%> against him.
The <S%H2981>increase<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H1540>depart<s%>, and his goods shall flow <S%H5064>away<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H639>wrath<s%>.

This is the <S%H2506>portion<s%> of a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> from <S%H430>God<s%>, and the <S%H5159>heritage<s%> <S%H561>appointed<s%> unto him by <S%H410>God<s%>. appointed: Heb. of his decree from God
